description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Notice historique sur l'ancien comté de Hornes et sur les anciennes seigneuries de Weert, Wessem, Ghoor et Kessenich. [By Mathias Joseph Wolters. With plates, including a map. Followed by “Notes sur Horn et ses seigneurs” by A. Perreau.]" Contributor: PERREAU, Antoine Charles Franc̢ois Théodore. Contributor: WOLTERS, Mathias Joseph. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010493.w.12.(2.)", "British Library HMNTS 10270.d.30." Page: 199 Place of Publishing: Gand Date of Publishing: 1850 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001728970 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
